description:
**

Cyd’s Day Off

**
I settled in to the corner of the studio to watch Damon guest direct this shoot with Sara Faye. I knew he would do a good job, but I had no idea that he would do such an amazing job that I would consider it to be one of the best shoots, if not
the
best shoot to appear on Device Bondage to date. Every scene is intense and riveting. Don’t even think about skimming this one.
title: Cyd's Day Off
